title: List collections
description: List collections. Gets a list of collections based on category IDs. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language headers to get translated content in another language.

categoryIds.description: List of categoryId values to retrieve information on from the server.

catalogId.description: The ID of the catalogue to retrieve the collections information from.

multipleCategoryPaths.description: Indicates whether to return multiCatalogCategoryPaths and multiCatalogCategoryIdPaths to display linked paths from multiple catalogs prepended with catalog name and id respectively.
